doc.title: Mediamadammen
doc.plot: In this rather short-lived, lighthearted format for a Flemish commercial TV station, which has practically abandoned news reporting, an off-screen voice paraphrasing Charlie's Angels send out three female celebrities (the Dutch title means 'media ladies') -beauty queens, notably former holders of the Miss Belgium title, except for former Flemish Big Brother participant Deborah Ostrega- on individual 'missions' to report on various 'media events', usually interviewing men and rather desperately trying to play their female charms to get them to say or do a little more, or something out of character, such as a jock allowing one to wash his back or a politician to play a silly game.
